text: A wid iumnen! Ccada garawen, ma tusa d tmeppant ar yiwen segwen. Di lawan uweûûi, sin irgazen iêesbiyen, segwen, ne$ wiyav war segwen, ma tellam d iminigen di tmurt, u tusa kwen id twa$it n tmeppant. A ten qesden deffir téallit. Ma tcukkem, sgallet pen s Öebbi: "ur d nesfayday syis, xas iaâna llzem nne$, ur nteffer ccada n Öebbi, mulac, nekwni a nili seg imednab
